name: Warlight Bravestone
description:
Back us on Kickstarter!

Warlight is an action rpg, dungeon crawler based on the Bravestone Fortress.
You, as a Warlight, will be sent from the Fortress of Light to help the Bravestone Fortress.

The game focuses on an intensive combat with many different skills that can be used to defeat your enemies, with countless character customization items to aid throughout your Journey

Over 400 items can be found within the game, which are split between: Equipment, Miscellaneous items and Materials. Each equipment has unique bonus effects, with different types of bonuses when equipped and which can unlock new bonus effects

Warlight Bravestone contains original soundtrack made by pegonthetrack

Lots of fun awaits you at Bravestone Fortress, can you come and help it?
